markdown: <::scan_code: Barcode-like pattern of vertical lines::> ATTN DEPT W48 NATIONAL SMOKER SERVICES PO BOX 834063 RICHARDSON TX 75083-9775 <::logo: Unidentifiable No readable text. The logo consists of several thick, horizontal black lines stacked vertically.::> <::attestation: Postal Indicia NO POSTAGE NECESSARY IF MAILED IN THE UNITED STATES A rectangular box containing upside-down text, centrally located.::> FIRST-CLASS MAIL PERMIT NO 359 RICHARDSON TX BUSINESS REPLY MAIL It's the law. Selling or distributing cigarettes to minors is a violation of law. To further ensure that we are in compliance with the law, we are asking you to confirm your age for our records by sending us a copy of official identification. We have provided instructions, along with a postage-paid reply envelope, for your convenience. Your help is greatly appreciated! nuwu: <::R.J. Reynolds WE WORK FOR SMOKERS : figure::> Drought to you by: America's favorite cigarette brand SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy. Brought to you by America's favorite cigarette brands. © 1996 (4) RJ Reynolds Tobacco Co. <::A stylized image of a person's head and shoulders, with the text "Confirm as one" overlaid on their face. To the right, a partial view of an identification card (resembling a driver's license) is shown. The ID card has the following visible details: - Top right: "0000000" - "CLASS C" - "ENDORSEMENTS NONE" - "ISSUED 9/27/94" - "You're 21 or older" (this text is prominently displayed across the ID card) - "EXPIRATION 9/27/62" - Fields for personal information: - "SEX" - "HAIR" - "EYES GRN" - "R" - "HEIGHT 6 02" - "DNR" - "RESTRICTIONS 0" - "SIGNATURE John D. Booker": figure::> Copying some forms of official identification is prohibited in some states. If you live in one of these states, please copy one of the other forms of official identification. W48

chunks.markdown: ATTN DEPT W48 NATIONAL SMOKER SERVICES PO BOX 834063 RICHARDSON TX 75083-9775
<::logo: Unidentifiable No readable text. The logo consists of several thick, horizontal black lines stacked vertically.::>
<::attestation: Postal Indicia NO POSTAGE NECESSARY IF MAILED IN THE UNITED STATES A rectangular box containing upside-down text, centrally located.::>
FIRST-CLASS MAIL PERMIT NO 359 RICHARDSON TX BUSINESS REPLY MAIL

Selling or distributing cigarettes to minors is a violation of law. To further ensure that we are in compliance with the law, we are asking you to confirm your age for our records by sending us a copy of official identification. We have provided instructions, along with a postage-paid reply envelope, for your convenience.
nuwu: <::R.J. Reynolds WE WORK FOR SMOKERS : figure::> Drought to you by: America's favorite cigarette brand
SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy.
Brought to you by America's favorite cigarette brands. © 1996 (4) RJ Reynolds Tobacco Co.
